contentrichtext.text: {{Infobox album | <!-- See Wikipedia:WikiProject_Albums --> | Name = ''Under the Radar'' | Type = Studio album | Artist = [[Little Feat]] | Cover = Under the Radar (Little Feat album) cover art.jpg | Released = June 16, 1998 | Recorded = | Genre = [[Southern rock]], [[blues rock]], [[swamp rock]] | Length = 70:32 | Label = CMC International | Producer = [[Paul Barrere|Paul Barrère]]<br />[[Bill Payne]] | Last album = ''[[Live from Neon Park]]''<br />(1996) | This album = ''Under the Radar''<br />(1998) | Next album = ''[[Chinese Work Songs]]''<br />(2000) }} {{Album ratings | rev1 = [[Allmusic]] | rev1Score = {{Rating|3|5}} <ref>{{Allmusic|class=album|id=r355631/review|first=Matthew|last=Greenwald}}</ref> | rev2 = | rev2Score = }} '''''Under the Radar''''' is the twelfth studio album by the American rock band [[Little Feat]], released in 1998. (see [[1998 in music]]). It was the fifth studio album since the band reunited in 1988 and the second since vocalist Shaun Murphy joined Little Feat. ==Track listing== #"Home Ground" (Barrère) – 4:07 #"Eden's Wall" (Barrère, Murphy, Payne) – 6:33 #"A Distant Thunder" (Barrère, Murphy, Payne) – 5:36 #"Hoy Hoy" (Barrère, Murphy, Payne, Tackett) – 4:08 #"Under The Radar" (Barrère, Murphy, Payne) – 7:14 #"Vale Of Tears" (Barrère, Murphy, Payne, Takett) – 6:11 #"Loco Motives" (Barrère, Murphy, Payne, Takett) – 5:16 #"Ferocious Morning" (Barrère, Murphy, Payne, Tackett) – 6:06 #"Voiceless Territory (Intro to Falling Through the Worlds)" (Barrère, Murphy, Payne, Tackett) – 0:49 #"Falling Through the Worlds" (Barrère, Murphy, Payne, Tackett) – 5:55 #"The Blues Don't Tell It All" (Murphy, Payne) – 6:14 #"I Got Happiness" (Barrère, Murphy) – 4:32 #"Calling The Children Home" (Barrère, Payne, Tackett) – 7:51 == Band members== *[[Paul Barrere|Paul Barrère]] - [[guitar]], [[dobro]], [[Appalachian dulcimer|dulcimer]], [[harmonica]], vocals *[[Sam Clayton]] - percussion, vocals *[[Kenny Gradney]] - bass, vocals *[[Richie Hayward]] - [[Drum kit|drums]], vocals *[[Shaun Murphy (singer)|Shaun Murphy]] - vocals, [[tambourine]] *Bill Payne - keyboards, vocals *[[Fred Tackett]] - guitar, dobro, trumpet, vocals == Texicali Horns== *[[Darrell Leonard]] - [[trumpet]], [[trombonium]] *[[Joe Sublett]] - [[saxophone]] Tracks 1, 2, 13 ==Additional personnel== *[[Lenny Castro]] - [[percussion instrument|percussion]] (tracks 1,2) *[[Piero Mariani (musician)|Piero Mariani]] - percussion (tracks 10,11,13) ==References== {{reflist|colwidth=30em}} {{Little Feat}} [[Category:1998 albums]] [[Category:Little Feat albums]] [[Category:Albums produced by Bill Payne]]
